com.kuryshee.safehome.rpi

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kuryshee.safehome.rpi.Main

  • public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    Class initializes program threads and sets the configuration of the application.
    Author:
    Ekaterina Kurysheva

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The entry point of the program. Initializes and starts working threads.
        Parameters:
        args - command line arguments. Expects paths to the configuration file and user managing file.
